entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
